Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: Oversight - Are For-Profit and Vocational Educational Institutions Helping the Efforts of the City’s Immigrants to Enter the Workforce?
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Are For-Profit and Vocational Educational Institutions Helping the Efforts of the City’s Immigrants to Enter the Workforce?

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Department of Education to convene a task force to review the outreach practices and graduate outcomes at institutions with gainful employment programs in New York State.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dept of Education to convene a task force to review the outreach practices and graduate outcomes at institutions with gainful employment programs in NYS.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor
